name: Pranksters: The Treasure of the Indians
name_original: Pranksters: The Treasure of the Indians
description:
Pranksters: The Treasure of the Indians is an arcade game developed by Glassfish Games. It was originally released in 2005. GarageDeveloper International published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Pranksters: The Treasure of the Indians is available on PC.
